bug.description: HEIP!!! I use v6 release. Training my own data set(singe class) .but mAP<0.6 . The confidence of the detected pictures is mostly less than 0.5. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/64635812/80795839-3b259a80-8bd0-11ea-8c6e-bb763dfb802a.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/949600981>@949600981</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in our work! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Training Tutorial</denchmark-link> to get started, and see our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/blob/master/tutorial.ipynb>Google Colab Notebook</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov3>Docker Image</denchmark-link> , and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/wiki/GCP-Quickstart>GCP Quickstart Guide</denchmark-link> for example environments. If this is a bug report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/949600981>@949600981</denchmark-link> use the latest code, i.e. git clone a new version.
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
